name: PoshProgressBar
tagline: A PowerShell ProgressBar in XAML using Material Design in XAML Toolkit from ButchersBoy
body:
### PoshProgressBar
This is a project intended to make it easy to add beautiful GUI based Progressbars to any PowerShell script or project

### Installation Methods
1. [Download](https://github.com/Tiberriver256/PoshProgressBar/tree/master/PoshProgressBar) and install the module
2. Install from the PowerShell Gallery with the following code:

`Install-Module -Name PoshProgressBar`

### Examples
